page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: { {Kenton's Newsletter { }Kenton's Newsletter is a way of communicating local news through the village.It is like a mini newspaper.Kenton School interviewed the Editor of the newsletter he told us about it,he said he tries to put in some writing from the School if we send anything.In June 85 we sent in a poem about May Day.In the newsletter there are items on Kenton and Powderham womans in institute,Kenton's senior citizens assocations etc.The normal things in the newsletter are,advertising jobs in Kenton like painting that people need doing,and some people want building to be done.
